Text: Hrrm - please mr. azoozz! Would you be so kind and give us atleast one complete copy... Thanx!

Sorry I am doing what I can to get these books uploaded to you all. I understand that the rate is slow, and I am working on it. thankyou for your comment.

As you all know not everyone seeds after they get thier files. so please be patient...I asure you this book is worth the wait.
Looking forward to this - thanks for the upload
Oh you will love it..be sure to listen to "the pillars of the Earth" first. "world without end is the sequel.
Thanks for the upload. Loved the first book and I'm excited to hear the sequel!
thanks so much for uploading! definitely gona listen to this whole thing, but so far it's not the greatest audio quality :(

Ken Follet is a wonderful writer. I've read both The Pillars of the Earth and World without End, and they are staggering. I have begun reading one of his newer books; Fall of Giants. It is good, but nothing can compare with the Kingsbridge series :)

Thank you AZ for uploading. Good man
